statements: SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, target_energy_reduction FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM demand_response_programs WHERE target_energy_reduction > 0.1;
SELECT program_name, target_energy_reduction FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs WHERE target_energy_reduction > 0.1 ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY program_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT program_name, DATE_DIFF(end_date, start_date) AS duration_days FROM demand_response_programs WHERE target_energy_reduction >= 0.05;
SELECT AVG(target_energy_reduction) AS avg_reduction, COUNT(*) AS total_programs FROM demand_response_programs WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM program;
SELECT program_name, energy_reduction_target FROM program ORDER BY energy_reduction_target DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program WHERE energy_reduction_target > 0.1;
SELECT program_name, participant_name, email FROM program JOIN participant ON program.program_id = participant.program_id;
SELECT participant_name, phone_number FROM participant WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM program WHERE energy_reduction_target > 0.05;
SELECT participant_name, email FROM participant WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM program WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT program_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM participant GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT participant_name, program_name FROM participant JOIN program ON participant.program_id = program.program_id;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT participant_name, program_name, is_active FROM participants;
SELECT program_name, energy_savings_percentage FROM demand_response_programs WHERE energy_savings_percentage > 5.0;
SELECT reading_date, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_data ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM demand_response_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, energy_savings_percentage FROM participants JOIN demand_response_programs ON participants.program_id = demand_response_programs.program_id WHERE is_active = TRUE;

SELECT program_name, participant_name, energy_usage FROM demand_response_programs JOIN participants ON demand_response_programs.program_id = participants.program_id JOIN energy_usage_data ON participants.participant_id = energy_usage_data.participant_id WHERE energy_savings_percentage > 10;

SELECT program_id, program_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM demand_response_programs LEFT JOIN participants ON demand_response_programs.program_id = participants.program_id GROUP BY program_id ORDER BY total_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT participant_name, address, phone_number FROM participants;
SELECT reading_date, usage FROM energy_usage;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, energy_savings FROM demand_response_programs;
SELECT * FROM demand_response_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM demand_response_programs WHERE energy_savings > 100;
SELECT * FROM participants INNER JOIN demand_response_programs ON participants.program_id = demand_response_programs.program_id;
SELECT participant_name, address FROM participants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage ORDER BY reading_date DESC, usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Phone' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.response_id, p.program_name, e.event_timestamp, r.response_value FROM responses r JOIN programs p ON r.program_id = p.program_id JOIN events e ON r.event_id = e.event_id;
